title: Pair of T206 tougher backs...Drum and Red Hindu
author: Chicago206

posts.post_title: Pair of T206 tougher backs...Drum and Red Hindu
posts.post_content:
Drum is a Kroh, PSA 2....light blue stain on the upper right corner of the back. A light crease runs east/west just above "350" and is also visible from the front. A wrinkle runs north/south between the "R" and "U" in Drum and is not visible from the front. $2300.

Red Hindu is a Devore, PSA 1....multiple light creases throughout, moderate crease with paper break on front lower right corner, and just a fantastic back for a 1!  $800.

Prices are shipped with insurance....USPS money orders or certified bank checks (7-10 days to clear) are accepted. Would do both for a package deal of $3,000. If you say "sold" here in this thread, you get preference. PM's are also acceptable, but cards will be sold to first taker!

[IMG]http://i220.photobucket.com/albums/dd37/geckster109/bam002.jpg[/IMG]

[IMG]http://i220.photobucket.com/albums/dd37/geckster109/rh001.jpg[/IMG]
Bump TTT. Figured those of you who struck out in REA may want to spend some of that cash!
Are my asking prices THAT much out of line? Or does everyone already have all the Drums they need already?:D
